thread.title: YouTube football team Hashtag United unveil new 2017 Umbro kits ahead of US tour
thread.title_full: YouTube football team Hashtag United unveil new 2017 Umbro kits ahead of US tour

author: Liam Prenderville
title: YouTube football team Hashtag United unveil new 2017 Umbro kits ahead of US tour
text:
Sport YouTube football team Hashtag United unveil new 2017 Umbro kits ahead of US tour The striking blue home kit and purple away number will be worn in Atlanta and New York later this month Share Hashtag United kit (Photo: Umbro) Share     
Hashtag United have unveiled their latest kits with sportswear giants Umbro. 
The YouTube football club are an innovative amateur side and have attracted media attention from all over the world. 
Rather than playing in a conventional league, they regularly face off against celebrity teams and staff members of Premier League clubs. 
Hashtag United agreed a kit deal with Umbro earlier this year and the first kits have been released. 
The kits will be worn for the first time when they tour the United States later this month. Hashtag United away Kit (Photo: Umbro) 
The home kit is a striking blue and yellow number with the reverse purple and black. 
A special font has been developed by Umbro for the club, with the strips carrying their 'Don't Forget to # It' motto. 
Captain Spencer Owen said: "I'm absolutely loving the new kits. Umbro have done a fantastic job in bringing our ideas to life. 
"Having unique football kits for your team is a dream come true and I just can't wait to get out there on the pitch and wear these for the first time on our American tour." Hashtag United agreed the deal in January (Photo: Instagram/hashtagutd) Hashtag United in action (Photo: YouTube/Spencer FC) 
Hashtag United will face a number of teams in Atlanta and New York during the tour. 
The club's professional eSports players, who represent them in FIFA tournaments across the world, will also wear the kits at upcoming events. Like us on Facebook
